summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5999 for the improvement of 49th Avenue Southwest from West Dakota Street to West Andover Street, and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80411, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
